data.title: Kristin Chenoweth's Husband And Relationship History
data.meta_description: Kristin Chenoweth's husband, Josh Bryant, is the latest addition to the talented actress and singer's intriguing dating history. Known for her sensational ...
data.text:
Kristen Chenoweth and Backroad Anthem guitarist Josh Bryant first publicly confirmed their relationship via Instagram in July 2018.

Bryant proposed on the rooftop of New York City's Rainbow Room on October 27, 2021, People reported.

"I've been the runaway bride. Now that I've found him, I won't let him go. I will race to greet him at the altar," Chenoweth said. Bryant added, "My best friend and soulmate said 'YES' to me! Kristin is my world, my everything, and I can't wait to spend the rest of my life with her!"

Josh Bryant is a musician from Nashville who works at Sandals Church where he serves as a worship leader. Bryant is a talented guitarist and singer, attributes that have no doubt added depth to his passion for music ministry. He gained public attention primarily through his relationship with Kristin Chenoweth.

Kristin Chenoweth's relationship with Andrew Pruett began in late 2014. They reportedly met through mutual friends and quickly started dating. Chenoweth and Pruett maintained a low-key relationship, keeping their dating life somewhat private from the media. Unfortunately, the couple decided to part ways after about a year, ending their relationship in 2015.

Andrew Pruett is a business executive, known as the CEO and co-founder of the esports organization NRG. Aside from his corporate ventures, Pruett gained some media attention through his relationship with actress Kristin Chenoweth. Prior to his relationship with Kristin, Pruett was married to actress Abigail Spencer, with whom he shares a son.

Dana Brunetti and Kristin Chenoweth began dating sometime in 2014. The two made an attractive couple, often appearing together at public events and sharing pictures on social media. After a year into their relationship, it became clear that the couple was facing challenges. Their work commitments often forced them to live in different states, creating a strain on their relationship. They decided to end their relationship in November 2014.

Dana Brunetti is an American film producer and social networking entrepreneur. He is recognized for co-founding the digital production company Trigger Street Productions. In the world of cinema, Brunetti is known for producing acclaimed films like The Social Network and Captain Phillips.

Kristin Chenoweth caught public attention when she started dating Jake Pavelka in 2012. The duo met at an event and were instantly attracted to each other. However, their busy schedules and long-distance relationship were challenging. After several months, by the summer of 2013, the couple decided to part their ways.

Jake Pavelka is a reality television personality, perhaps best known for his appearance on ABC's popular dating show, The Bachelor. Pavelka, who works as a pilot, won the hearts of viewers during the 14th season of the show with his charm and good looks. Apart from The Bachelor, he has appeared in several other reality television shows.

Kristin Chenoweth and Charlie McDowell were reportedly together in 2008. The dates of their relationship are vague due to its private nature, but they were spotted together on multiple occasions which led people to believe they were an item. They reportedly met through mutual connections in the film and TV industry. Although neither of them publicly announced the end of their relationship, it is believed they were not together for very long due to other relationships that Chenoweth entered into around the same time period.

Charlie McDowell is a talented film director and producer, best known for directing the Netflix film The Discovery and The One I Love. He was born into an acting family, the son of Malcolm McDowell and Mary Steenburgen, and stepson of Ted Danson.

Kristin Chenoweth and Seth Green's relationship took place around 2008. While the specifics of how they met are not publicly known, their similar industry ties of acting and voice acting likely brought them together. The duration of their relationship is also unclear but believed to have been brief.

Seth Green is an acclaimed actor, producer, writer, and director. He is especially recognized for his work in animation including his role as Chris Griffin on the popular animated sitcom Family Guy and his creation and voice acting on Robot Chicken.
